Here's a list of publications that have resulted from my research. You can follow this work on [Google Scholar](https://scholar-google-com.usgslibrary.idm.oclc.org/citations?user=CRU3WVMAAAAJ&hl=en) and [ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Jeff-Baldock). If you encounter a paywall, please email me and I will be happy to send you a copy of the paper.
